definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: In the distant targets at the same time, don't think slightingly of the nearby.
sentences.chinese: 在瞄准遥远目标的同时，不要轻视近处的东西。

sentences.english: How to get to the nearest subway station?
sentences.chinese: 如何从金桥回到龙阳路或近处的地铁站？

sentences.english: Leaves of banyans nearby are so bright after the rain wash.
sentences.chinese: 近处的榕树银杏经过雨水的滋润之后更显得光鲜。

sentences.english: I come to gaze upon your windows near at hand.
sentences.chinese: 我到您窗子下面的近处来望望。

sentences.english: In the foreground lay golden fields and copses glittering in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 金黄色的田野和小树林在近处闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: It towered like a giant above all the other tree near by.
sentences.chinese: 它像巨人般地高耸在近处的林木间。

sentences.english: Two of the missing items were recovered nearby and were slightly damaged.
sentences.chinese: 两件丢失的藏品在近处重新寻回，已轻微破损。

sentences.english: The little dot near the centre is the decimal point.
sentences.chinese: 怪圈中心近处的那个小圆圈，就是小数点。

sentences.english: And still those voices are calling from far away.
sentences.chinese: 这些声响仍然在近处咿咿呀呀。

definition: to gaze afar/to look into the distance
opposite bank (of a body of water)
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
as far as the eye can see
